name: Mr Blobby's Big Day Out
description:
Mr Blobby has experienced a terrible inconvenience, and he shall smite down those whom'st have wronged him with great vengeance and furious anger.

Your goal is to collect all 5 cheesecakes without losing all of your hearts to the dastardly tories or falling to the center of the earth.

Inspired by and made for the ever-stunning enigma wrapped in a mystery, shrowded in a layer of deli meat that is known in this universe as Crug.

Thanks to the wonderfully talented Ozzed for the music- you can check out the rest of their music here: https://ozzed.net/music/ <3
